GST revenue: Customs Dept collects RM54.8 billion12 Apr 2017https://forum.lowyat.net/topic/4264623PM: Kerajaan Tak Fungsi Kalau Tolak GST28 Apr 2017https://forum.lowyat.net/topic/4277271https://forum.lowyat.net/topic/4276075https://forum.lowyat.net/topic/4276348...“Jika kita tolak GST bermakna kita tolak lebih RM50 bilion setahun dari bajet (RM260 bilion) sekali gus kerajaan memang tidak boleh berfungsi dan berkhidmat kepada rakyat...Hendak bayar elaun penjawat awam pun tidak cukup....“If we were to exclude the GST from the annual budget, it would mean that we are deducting RM50bil a year from the Government’s usual budget of RM210bil. The Government cannot function,” Najib said in defending the decision to introduce the tax which the Opposition has often attacked.

Subromaniam: Government Cancels GST Order On 60 Food Items 19 Jun 2017https://forum.lowyat.net/topic/4330372...The Customs Department has cancelled the order which would have seen over 60 food items, including staples such as noodles, potatoes and spinach, subject to the goods and services tax (GST)....The decision was made after the issue was referred to the finance ministry.vs.PM: Mahathir Jaguh Buat Pusingan U15 Jan 2017https://forum.lowyat.net/topic/4175469..."Kebelakangan ini, Tun Mahathir terlalu banyak buat pusingan U dari segi pendiriannya, jadi kita boleh anggap Tun Mahathir sekarang ini jaguh pusingan U kerana tindakan dan kenyataan bercanggah sama sekali," katanya. PM: Pembangkang Pakar U-Turn27 Apr 2017https://forum.lowyat.net/topic/4276075...Buat kenyataan 'pusingan U' ini perkara biasa bagi pembangkang dan ia bukan satu yang luar biasa,kata Perdana Menteri Datuk Seri Najib Tun Razak....Kata Najib, misalnya dalam isu pelaksanaan Cukai Barangan dan Perkhidmatan (GST), pembangkang yang dahulu menentang pelaksanaannya, kini mula bertukar nada dalam isu ini...."Banyak lagi U-turn mereka akan buat...ada yang tiga kali U-turn isu yang sama," katanya dalam sidang medianya di Pusat Dagangan Dunia Putra (PWTC), di sini, malam ini.
